summary: A doting brother who works as a cab driver tries to hunt down three notorious criminals in Kolkata who had harmed his sister.
cast: Ajith Kumar|Shruti Haasan|Lakshmi Menon|Soori|Thambi Ramaiah|Ashwin Kakumanu|Kabir Duhan Singh|Rahul Dev|Aniket Chouhan|Vidyullekha Raman|Bala Saravanan|Swaminathan|Motta Rajendran|Mayilsamy|Appukutty|Kovai Sarala|Meera Krishna|Yogi Babu|Kamaljii|Sudha|Ramesh Thilak|Andy Barreca|Rob Peck|Sharmila Thapa|Amit Tiwari
title: Vedalam
